channel.title: jobs on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in jobs on Greg McMullen

item.title: Chasing Your Dream Job
item.description: This weekend I decided to head down to visit my girlfriend, who is attending IU Medical School, and while we know that living an hour apart is going to be tough we never realized how hard it was until today around 2:00. She and I have been together for the last five years and honestly we’ve both been rather selfish with doing what we want instead of really thinking about one another.
